item.description:
New member Angie's son Joseph has graduated, and she's throwing a party! Angie has graciously invited the entire chapter to attend. What better way to get to know a new member? We met Joseph while bowling last week; what a nice young man! So, if you're not going on the Gilda Ride, this will be a nice alternative way to spend the day. Deb & Judi have a great ride planned for along the coast prior to arriving at the party.
Meet at Walgreen's next to Bickfords at 9:30. The Group will leave at 10 am.
item.name: Coastal Ride & Party at Angie's
